none:
Originally ripped by Terminal Escape, posted on August 11, 2024 Description from Terminal Escape:
 Remember last week when I said I got a coupla tasty morsels from Zepol and I was excited to pump the new KILLRATIÖ tape? Well...I may have been excited, but I definitely was not prepared. Salmo Katorse is an absolutely flawless example of the pounding desperate crust tinged hardcore that dominated the 2000s, but KILLRATIÖ seem to have marinated in the desperation and the result is devastating. Listen to the last thirty seconds of "B.N.P." and know that these punks have figured it out...this is how you fukkn do it. I would love to see this band again. SALMO KATORSE
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=SumrZ8hTVT0

seo.title: Killratiö - Salmo Katorse - Terminal Escape
